name: impulse
description: Desktop music player using Electron, React and mpv IPC

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist/main/main/index.js file:dist/preload/preload/index.js && nodemon --watch dist/main --watch dist/preload --ext js --exec "cross-env ELECTRON_RENDERER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist/main/main/index.js"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:main && pnpm run build:preload && pnpm run build:renderer
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p tsconfig.main.json --noEmit && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --noEmit && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json --noEmit
scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build
scripts.release:local: pnpm run check && pnpm run package:linux
